turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, looking to order a beverage from the Starbucks on 57 63rd Street in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order beverage from starbuck in Philadelphia right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok may i have the street names again please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I'm sorry. It's on North 3rd Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: north 3rd street ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so what kind of drink and size for today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a grande cafe mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: grande cafe mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream on top right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok great, would that just be 1 order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, just for myself, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for yourself, sounds good, ok let me find the store closes to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok found a store close to north 3rd street in Philadelphia, let me repeat your order really quick.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so once again, that is grande cafe mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream on top right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect, drink has been ordered at the local store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.
